Hello there!

We're hostworld.uk, and we're a UK based web hosting provider. Let's cut to the chase, here are some key things you _need_ to know about us before you buy our plans and join us on your web hosting journey:

* 24/7 support and lightning fast ticket responses - we respond to all support tickets within 20 minutes on average!
* We only use state of the art SSD drives in all of our shared and reseller servers - no moving parts means a faster service for you!
* UK servers - we currently provide our services from UK data centres which provide super-fast connectivity, even if you don't live here!
* All our web hosting servers are running LiteSpeed. LiteSpeed can serve thousands of clients concurrently and with up to 220% faster loading times than Apache. LiteSpeed also offers great advanced caching support with WordPress using LSCache.
* We really do care about your hosting experience - talk to us, send us an email, pick up the phone, we're real people striving to provide every single one of our customers with a consistent and reliable hosting experience no matter how much is spent on hosting with us.
* We're reliable! We provide a 99.9% uptime guarantee because making sure your website is available is essential. You can see our uptime here https://status.hostworld.uk/.

If you need to know anything else about us send an email to sales@hostworld.uk and we'll be back in touch!

------------------------
**Uptime Guarantee**
------------------------

We are so confident we can offer 99.9% uptime or more that we have an uptime guarantee in place. Every package with us gets our 99.9% uptime guarantee - or your money back. You can also see our sever status in real time, and the true uptime of our servers. Check it our yourself here http://status.hostworld.uk.
